attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Classification of a curb polygon- whether it consists of parcels, islands, medians etc; and also its visibility
Indicates that a polygon is an elevated travelway
Indicates that a polygon is a second-level elevated travelway
Indicates that a polygon is a third-level elevated travelway
If polygon has been modified, the date that modifiaction has been done
If curb polygon did not exist in original version of curbline layer, the date that it was added
A code indicating reason that a segment had been edited
unique indentification number of a curb polygon
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.
